main event: A helicopter crew observed an unidentified aerial phenomenon over the Indian Ocean on November 30, 1963.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes., The target increased in size on the radar scope then slowly decreased before disappearing., The estimated distance of the target was about 20 miles, with an altitude of 20,000 feet., Multiple mentions of satellite decay and disintegration in related documents., The observer claimed the object exhibited peculiar characteristics during the observation.
witness description: helicopter crew and naval personnel observing the phenomenon
